articles.title: Trump’s Twists and Turns Over Iran Leave Oil Traders Hanging - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The oil market has been wrestling for days with Donald Trump’s next act in an escalating Middle East conflict. Now American jets have struck Iran’s three main nuclear sites, a move that leaves traders preparing for a price surge — but still guessing where the…

articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: European leaders worry they’re too reliant on U.S. tech - TechCrunch
articles.description: European governments may be reconsidering their use of American technology and services, according to a new report in The New York Times.
